revised_title: Franz Bergel: A Life in Chemistry and Beyond
tldr: This biographical memoir recounts the life of Franz Bergel, a chemist born in Vienna in 1900. Bergel's early life was marked by the collapse of the Austro-Hungarian Empire and the chaos that followed. He pursued chemistry studies in various universities, eventually focusing on natural products with physiological activity. His career was affected by personal and political challenges, including the rise of the National Socialists in Germany. Bergel eventually emigrated to the United Kingdom, where he continued his research in chemistry.
